com.lime.bean
Class ModularApplication

java.lang.Object
  com.lime.bean.ModularApplication

public class ModularApplication
extends java.lang.Object

A bean describing a modular application. A bean of this type must be declared and initialized in Lime root context for each of the Modular Application in the domain.

Author:
Daniele Milani

Constructor Detail

ModularApplication

public ModularApplication(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String commonCtxPattern,
                          java.lang.String extCxtPattern,
                          java.lang.String[] requiredmodules,
                          java.lang.String[] optionalmodules)
Parameters:
name - the name of the modular application
commonCtxPattern - the classpath pattern where the common context descriptors are stored within the application.
extCxtPattern - the classpath pattern where the module context descriptors are stored within the module.
requiredmodules - the list of required modules names
optionalmodules - the list of optional modules names
See Also:
